I have updated the service with those changes:
 - the "REST" logo now point=
s back to http://search.restlet.org
 - a list of indexed sites is available=
 at http://search.restlet.org/sites
 - queries can be bookmarked like http:=
//search.restlet.org?q=3Dwadl

Cheers,
Jerome
